mapper.update: update schedule set schedule_departure_date=#{scheduleDepartureDate}, schedule_arrival_date=#{scheduleArrivalDate} , schedule_flight=#{scheduleFlight} where schedule_id=#{scheduleId}
mapper.select: select route_departure, route_destination, route_time, route_price from schedule join route on schedule_route_id=route_id where schedule_flight=#{scheduleFlight}
